channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 17:53 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire.
item.description: 游댮 17:53 The threat of shelling! Now in Nikopol and the Nikopol Territorial Community Artillery Fire. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 17:50 pm alarm to the Transcarpathian region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 17:50 pm alarm to the Transcarpathian region.Creck on further messages.#Transcarpathian_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 17:49 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- March Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 17:49 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- March Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
